body: Double-clicking a deck in the Decks screen should perform the same action as selecting a deck and clicking on the Select action.
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Double click deck = select deck
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on August 30, 2014 04:00:15_

Double-clicking a deck in the Decks screen should perform the same action as selecting a deck and clicking on the Select action.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=669_
